body_html:
Your particular problem is that the ZerosLikeOp kernel defined in constant_op.cc is only registered for float and double (contant_op.cc:234/235), instead it should be registered for all numeric types.

If you can write a fix, that would be awesome.

There's a larger issue here that should be cleaned up. We have at least three different zeros_like implementations lying around: One zeros_like in array_ops.py, one ZerosLikeOp in constant_op.cc, and one ZerosLike method in control_flow_ops.py's ControlFlowState (that last one may be legitimate, but should be refactored to use ZerosLikeOp). Assigning @sherrym for triage on that issue.

body:
Your particular problem is that the ZerosLikeOp kernel defined in constant_op.cc is only registered for float and double (contant_op.cc:234/235), instead it should be registered for all numeric types.

If you can write a fix, that would be awesome. 

There's a larger issue here that should be cleaned up. We have at least three different zeros_like implementations lying around: One zeros_like in array_ops.py, one ZerosLikeOp in constant_op.cc, and one ZerosLike method in control_flow_ops.py's ControlFlowState (that last one may be legitimate, but should be refactored to use ZerosLikeOp). Assigning @sherrym for triage on that issue.
